name: Xmas Blast
description:
Its that time of the year again so why not escape from boredom and have a blast this holiday season?

On his way to the factory Santa has dropped the toys. Fortunately for him they are all bubble wrapped. As we all know the downside is bubbles burst so you need to collect the toys before that happens. Easy and fun to play but a challenge to master so why not try your hand at blasting the presents.

Please note this game is free to download and play but contains adverts.
